Caaspi - the world's biggest digital product content provider

Casspi is a CaaS (Content-as-a-Service) platform, which makes it easy for sellers to integrate brands’ digital product content on their eCommerce websites.

Not only does we help brands find new avenues for growth and expand their user base, but also enable sellers to source new digital product content seamlessly and free of charge - unlike any other eCommerce CaaS platform out there.

The end result is more people getting into the eCommerce world - ultimately, growing the pie for us all. With Caaspi brands can ship product content updates directly to third party websites, and access on-site performance data.

Caaspi tools

Cherry Picker

Add products to your WooCommerce website while surfing through popular online stores.

Cherry Picker will import all the product details, including the title, price, description, category, images gallery, thus saving you hours of content work.
